references.formattedCitation: Wikipedia: The Free Encyclopedia That Anyone Can Edit. Wikimedia Foundation, 2001. https://en.wikipedia.org.

description: The modern Strophades/Strofades islands (Stamfani and Arpi): an Ionian island group mentioned in Vergil and other ancient sources.

names.details: The only attestation of this ethnikon I can find (via TLG) is in Stephanus. It may simply be learned extrapolation on his part (or that of a source), rather than anything actually used in antiquity.
